dict.string: Bowing the same year as the BRZ, but to considerably less fanfare, is the XV Crosstrek. Little more than an Impreza hatchback with a slightly higher ride height, it’s the old Outback formula revisited. Word is that it was intended for Europe and not the United States, but U.S. dealers know a hit when they see it and lobby successfully to bring it here. The model is now Subaru’s third-biggest seller, after the Forester and Outback, and has been renamed simply “Crosstrek.”
